desc:
Team Newron in association with Geekonix offers you a free workshop on 28th February, 2020.We will be providing an exhilarating experience resembling an actual parliamentary session.
The ones who are interested please fill up the given form:
https://forms.gle/vwHFJv22fPBYy7GU7
name: Youth Parliament Workshop

desc:
Preparation and practice is the key to be a winner!
Gear up to experience a glimpse of the exuberance at the Intra College Fest, broughtto you by Geekonix, exclusive only to freshies and second years.
Come, participate to get a sneak peek of what's in store for EDGE_20 and live the dream a month before EDGE on 4th, 5th& 6thof March, 2020.

Time: 3 - 6 pm
Venue: Phase-1 & Phase-3 buildings, G-Series
(Event-wise details and venue will be conveyed soon)
Registration Details
  • All events except Bridge Designing: Rs 130 (Coupon discount applicable)
  • Bridge designing only: Rs 50
  • All events including Bridge Designing: Rs 160 (Coupon discount applicable)

Registrations begin on 24thFebuary, Monday, 12 am onwards, in the EDGE Room (room number 401, old library building).
name: Intra College Fest

desc:
Get your hands on the official merchandise of EDGE_20 and "Revamp your swag".

Priced at INR 250 each.

Pre book your merchandise by paying:-
Rs 100 (for a single merchandise) / Rs 150 (for both the merchandise)

Those who are buying the merchandise in both the colours - i.e. white and black - can avail a discount of Rs 40 on the total amount.

For the ones who have already bought the coupon, the discount that has been mentioned in it can also be availed in addition to the above mentioned one.
name: EDGE Merchandise

desc:
Every good deed is like a feather in the crown of your achievement, indeed!

With the utmost enthusiasm, we at EDGE'20 try to give bring warmth to the forsaken hearts of forlorn people. We aspire to reflect a little sunshine in their grey. EDGE DEEDS is a train which conveys happiness, smile, peace, succor etc. and provide these in every underprivileged and unheeded station.
name: EDGE Deeds - Mega Event

desc: The star-spangled night, where stars come down to illuminate our stage and freeze the moment with their intriguing speeches and rib-tickling performances ushering in a phenomenal blend of warmth and fervour.  Being a perfect medley of interaction, innovation and recreation, Edge Night ensures that friends who laugh together, stay together and almost certainly, stay together.

name: EDGE Night - Mega Event

desc:
"An idea is salvation by imagination."
The goal of EDGE Talks is to inform and educate students in an accessible way. Our speakers take the stage to present valuable new knowledge, innovative researches and ideas, worth spreading. Through EDGE Talks, students are exposed to speakers who are doing cutting edge work across numerous causes. EDGE Talks aims to inspire innovation and broaden your horizons.

Stay tuned for further updates.
iG:

(Your Bong Guy),bguy.webp,Mir Afsar Ali,mir.webp
